name: Roll a Ball Tower
description:
Project: Roll-a-Ball Tower

Team 14: Paul Leelaviwatana

The objective of this game is to find and collect the Dragon's Gem (red cube) before time runs out! Use your wits, patience, or creativity to complete the stage.

Falling in the lava will cause your character to be sent back to the beginning, losing valuable time!

Controls: WASD and/or arrow keys.

Perspective: Top-down, 3D+gravity, 3D.
